chapters.title: Chapter 38:  Maidens of the Spear
chapters.info: Chiad, p. 434 (347)—Short, blonde Maiden of the Spear. She is of the Stones River sept of the Goshien Aiel. She became Bain's first sister—the two had to sneak through the camp of the other to the Wise Ones because their clans were (and still are) in blood feud. See also Bain; Gaul.
